subject: Re: Order #SSN4763, how did it go?
description_text:
Am i supposed to get a power control box? If so how do i power the motors
up with out it? I onoy rexiced power supply for the wall.

*Z.BURROWS*

On Fri, 2 Jan 2026, 13:45 SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Zachary Burrows,  The three VAM motors you purchased include a dedicated 24V power supply. May I ask if you also have a controller box?

I do not have one. I thought it came with the package as displayed in the
instruction manual?

*Z.BURROWS*
Hi Zachary Burrows,  The VAM kit includes a power supply.
